title: HUK Tide Point Solid Short Sleeve Shirt, Button Down for Men
description: HUK: Uniting anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish
MOISTURE TRANSPORT: Keeping dry is critical to keeping warm on the cold water - this shirt's material has hydrophobic qualities to transports water & sweat away from the skin
QUICK DRYING: Dries quickly so that you can stay comfortable on or off the water
100% POLYESTER. TEXTURED FOR SUPERIOR MOISTURE TRANSPORT, MECHANICAL STRETCH, QUICK DRYING, MESH-BACKED CHEST POCKET, PERFORATED BACK, INTERIOR EYEWEAR WIPE, UPF 30+
